article_title: Heavy hearts: Clare House 'guests' absorb news of closing

article_metadata.description: BLOOMINGTON — Bags of food, diapers, baby wipes, hygiene products and blankets were handed out — as they are twice a week — at 703 E. Washington St.
article_metadata.author:
Paul Swiech
pswiech@pantagraph.com
